author: adityapatwardhan
body:
<!--

If you are a PowerShell Team member, please make sure you choose the Reviewer(s) and Assignee for your PR.
If you are not from the PowerShell Team, you can leave the fields blank and the Maintainers will choose them for you. If you are familiar with the team, feel free to mention some Reviewers yourself.

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).

-->

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body:
Didn't check them all, but I spot-checked a few and they look right to me. 

Are you planning on getting the content uploaded *before* the merge so that we know everything is passing? Or is there a chicken/egg problem there?

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: Working on updating the help content with the correct fwlinks. We would need to move it to 'live' before these tests pass. Then we can merge.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: There are some failures in CI runs. Can you please fix them?

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: The failures are because the help content is wrong. I am fixing it in a different repo. The failures in CI are dependent on this PR: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell-Docs/pull/1735

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @daxian-dbw I have updated PR and the required help content is also fixed. All tests pass now. Please have another look.

title: Add new Fwlinks for v6 help content
